EMailInformation.Subject: FocusPay POS Activation Notice
EMailInformation.Message:
Dear @FIRST_NAME@,

Your attendant @ATTENDANT_NAME@ has activated the POS application with ID @APPICATION_ID@.
You now have a total of @TOTAL@ licenses in your account.
In case you want additional POS licenses please contact your company at @COMPANY_ADMIN_EMAIL_ID@

If you have any questions regarding the use of your FocusPay website or need additional assistance,
please contact FocusPay technical support at @FOCUSPAY_VOICE_SUPPORT@ or @FOCUSPAY_EMAIL_SUPPORT@

Thank you again for choosing FocusPay and good luck with business.

Sincerely,
FocusPay
